document.title: Tutorial
document.paragraph:
1WEL Tutorial WEL is shipped with a tutorial among its sample programs. This tutorial shows you how to develop a simple WEL application and contains eight different samples listed below:
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step1/index.htmlStep1 - A Basic WEL Application.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step2/index.htmlStep2 - Responding to an event.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step3/index.htmlStep3 - Displaying output on a WEL_CLIENT_DC.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step4/index.htmlStep4 - A very basic drawing program.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step5/index.htmlStep5 - Using a WEL_MODAL_DIALOG.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step6/index.htmlStep6 - Re-drawing a window by redefining on_paint.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step7/index.htmlStep7 - Adding menus.
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step8/index.htmlStep8 - Using a WEL_OPEN_FILE_DIALOG and a WEL_SAVE_FILE_DIALOG.
